TEXT.TITLE: SPAIN'S INFLATION RISES 0.4 PCT IN FEBRUARY
TEXT.BODY: Spain's consumer price index rose 0.4 pct in February after increases of 0.7 pct the previous month and 0.4 pct in February last year, National Statistics Institute figures show. Year-on-year inflation was six pct compared with the government five pct target for 1987. It rose 8.3 pct last year. REUTER
